entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:07 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -25.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cartwright Airport 11:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -25.6°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -29.4°C
Wind: SSW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28 except minus 32 inland.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28 except minus 32 inland. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. High minus 6. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 24. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 23. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
